thread.title: Lily Lorber

author: Lily Lorber
title: Lily Lorber
text: I travel frequently between North and South America. I recommend to all my friends and acquaintances that they purchase their tickets and travel insurance from CheapoAir EXCLUSIVELY. Cheapoair gives you peace of mind. If the airline reschedules, puts you in another flight, cancels or 'messes up': Cheapoair is there to help you 24/7. There is always a live human ready to answer your call. The terms and conditions of their travel insurance are superior to all other's I have read. Their search engine is the best one I have seen. You can search by dates, airline, number of stops. Their "alternate date" grid is wonderful: easy to read and use. Stop overpaying. Stop worrying. Get P.O.M.G = Peace of Mind Guaranteed with Cheapoair.com !!
